faction_token_booster.name: Faction Token Booster
faction_token_booster.description: Increases token gains by 10% for all faction members for 24 hours.

faction_xp_booster.name: Faction XP Booster
faction_xp_booster.description: Increases XP gains by 10% for all faction members for 24 hours.

faction_capture_booster.name: Faction Capture Booster
faction_capture_booster.description: Increases catch rates by 10% for all faction members for 24 hours.

faction_battle_booster.name: Faction Battle Booster
faction_battle_booster.description: Increases battle rewards by 15% for all faction members for 24 hours.

faction_shiny_booster.name: Faction Shiny Booster
faction_shiny_booster.description: Increases shiny encounter rates by 5% for all faction members for 12 hours.

faction_territory_banner.name: Territory Banner
faction_territory_banner.description: Required to claim a territory for your faction.

faction_territory_defender.name: Territory Defender
faction_territory_defender.description: Increases defense value of a held territory by 25%.

faction_headquarters_upgrade.name: Headquarters Upgrade
faction_headquarters_upgrade.description: Upgrades your faction headquarters, increasing token generation by 50 per day.

faction_emblem.name: Faction Emblem
faction_emblem.description: Unlocks custom emblem display for all faction members.

faction_rare_spawn_booster.name: Rare Spawn Booster
faction_rare_spawn_booster.description: Increases rare Veramon encounter rates by 20% for all faction members for 12 hours.

faction_weekly_challenge_token.name: Weekly Challenge Token
faction_weekly_challenge_token.description: Registers your faction for the weekly challenge.

faction_war_banner.name: War Banner
faction_war_banner.description: Required to declare war on another faction.

faction_peace_treaty.name: Peace Treaty
faction_peace_treaty.description: Immediately ends a faction war without determining a winner.

faction_training_grounds.name: Training Grounds
faction_training_grounds.description: Permanently increases XP gain for all faction members by 5%.

faction_trader_alliance.name: Trader Alliance
faction_trader_alliance.description: Permanently reduces shop prices for all faction members by 5%.

faction_expedition_map.name: Expedition Map
faction_expedition_map.description: Unlocks a special expedition area with unique Veramon for 24 hours.

faction_donation_booster.name: Donation Booster
faction_donation_booster.description: Increases XP gained from treasury donations by 50% for 24 hours.

faction_legendary_lure.name: Legendary Lure
faction_legendary_lure.description: Increases legendary Veramon encounter rate by 2% for all faction members for 3 hours.

faction_raid_pass.name: Raid Pass
faction_raid_pass.description: Allows faction members to participate in a coordinated raid against a legendary Veramon.

faction_skill_booster.name: Skill Booster
faction_skill_booster.description: Increases move effectiveness by 10% for all faction members for 12 hours.
